mapper.select: SELECT m.member_no as member_no, m.member_id as member_id, m.member_nick as member_nick, p.point_amount as point_amount, j.staff_position as staff_position FROM tbmall_member m LEFT JOIN tbmall_point p on m.position_no = p.position_no LEFT JOIN tbmall_position j on m.position_no = j.position_no WHERE m.member_no =#{member_no}
